channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Senate votes to move forward with deal to end government shutdown
item.description: Eight Senate Democrats voted with Republicans on Sunday night to move forward with a package that would reopen the federal government. Why it matters:...

item.title: Senate deal would reverse shutdown firings
item.description: The deal reached in the Senate Sunday would reverse the mass firings initiated during the government shutdown — and guarantee backpay for furloughed g...

item.title: BBC leaders quit after backlash over edit of Trump's Jan. 6 speech in documentary
item.description: Two top BBC leaders resigned Sunday following criticism over the way a documentary edited a speech by President Trump on Jan. 6 and other matters rais...

item.title: Deal to end government shutdown in reach
item.description: A handful of Senate Democrats on Sunday indicated they are ready to advance a package of bills that could end the government shutdown , multiple sourc...

item.title: Senate takes key vote toward ending government shutdown
item.description: The deal that split Democrats doesn’t extend expiring ACA subsidies. If a bill passes the Senate, it needs the House to approve and President Donald T...

item.title: Trump administration orders states to pause paying full SNAP benefits
item.description: As the shutdown dragged on, USDA demanded that states “immediately undo” any steps they have taken to send full November payments to SNAP recipients.

item.title: Flight cancellations ‘only going to get worse,’ transportation secretary says
item.description: More than 2,700 flights were canceled and over 10,000 delayed, making Sunday the worst day for travel disruptions since the shutdown began.

item.title: Trump administration orders states "undo" full SNAP benefits
item.description: The U.S. Department of Agriculture directed states to "immediately undo" any steps taken to issue full food assistance benefits to Americans whose aid...

item.title: Ranking the 2028 Republican presidential contenders
item.description: Most of the contenders here are among Trump’s closest allies, but a non-MAGA candidate could bubble up.

item.title: Ten seconds in the Oval Office that overshadowed Trump’s drug-price win
item.description: A press conference collapse has sparked days of memes and jokes. Not all are accurate.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
